products.name: Smart Plug
products.description: Turn any device into a smart device with this easy-to-use smart plug.

products.name: Smart Power Strip
products.description: Control multiple devices with this smart power strip, which features individual outlets for each device.

products.name: Smart Outlet
products.description: This smart outlet is easy to install and allows you to control any device with your voice or phone.

products.name: Smart Switch
products.description: Replace your existing light switch with this smart switch and control your lights with your voice or phone.
